text.message: Press enter to advance in the story, let try it now...

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: A '> ' tells you have you need to respond to a question to continue, let's practice it too...

Lastly, puzzles have the symbol '>>>' and a header made of '=' signs 
(the answer to this one is pudding, see if you can guess the partial answer first!)
